title: The route for commercial photoelectrochemical water splitting: a review of large-area devices and key upscaling challenges
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2388-2434
DOI: 10.1039/D1CS01069G, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
António Vilanova, Paula Dias, Tânia Lopes, Adélio Mendes
The demand for green-H2 is steadily growing and PEC water splitting, one of the cleanest production routes, shall experience unparalleled economic and research stimulus, as the transition from lab-scale to commercial PEC devices is urgently needed.
